role.argrole: thing arg0 doesn't pay in time

example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 不仅)) (NP-SBJ (NP-APP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VP (VV 应) (VP (VV 纳) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *RNR*-3)))) (CC 及) (VP (VV 滞纳) (NP-OBJ-3 (-NONE- *T*-2)))))) (NP (NN 税款)) (ETC 等)) (NP (NN 计算))) (VP (VV 会) (VP (VV 出) (NP-OBJ (NN 问题)))))
